name: EAT my MIND
description:
You are evolving on a dreamy planet with one mission, to clean out the dark minds of this peaceful place. Be careful because the more you eat baddies the bigger it get. The chained ball attached to you can break the fragile world arround you. Take care of the environment and clean all of the darkness.

This game is made by Entonnoir:

Samuel PENNOBER, Lilian ROZE, Antoine MARRAMA, Matthias ODINA-BOTELLO, Sébastien PROVOST
